Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hello, Can I create a postback url to track my sales without using any tracker ?

Yes, you can create a postback URL to track your sales without using a third-party tracker. You can set up a general NewsBreak Postback by going to Tools > Event Management > Web Events and clicking the Create/test event button. Choose 'Postback' as your event tracking type and select 'Others' in the tracking service field. Then, follow the instructions provided based on your inputs on the platform. For more detailed guidance, you can refer to this article: [How to integrate a general NewsBreak Postback](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25226963388813-How-to-integrate-a-general-NewsBreak-Postback). Let me know if you need further assistance!
